decision_conditions:
The window(s) in the flank elevation(s) of the proposed development shall:
(a) be of purpose-made obscure glass,
(b) be permanently fixed closed below a height of 1.7m above finished floor level,
and shall thereafter be retained in that form.

<p class="MsoNormal" style=""><span style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">Notwithstanding
the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development)
(England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or
without modification), no window(s)/door(s), other than those shown on the approved
plans shall be installed in either first floor side elevation of the
development, nor the ground floor side elevation facing 86 Suffolk Road, of the
scheme hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local
planning authority.</span></p><p>



</p><p class="MsoNormal" style=""><br></p>
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

<p class="MsoNormal">The
development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the
following approved plans and documents:</p><p class="MsoNormal">PL-
A- 01 – Existing Floor Plans, Site Plan &amp; Photographs of Front and Rear; PL-
A- 02 – Proposed Floor Plans; PL- A- 03 – Existing and Proposed Elevations; Reasonable
Exception Statement (received 18.04.24)</p><p class="MsoNormal" style="text-align:justify">







</p><p class="MsoNormal">All
plans received <span style="background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">22.02.24, unless
otherwise stated</span><font face="Arial, sans-serif"><span style="font-size: 11pt;"><o:p></o:p></span></font></p>
description: Single and two storey side to rear extension; alteration and extension to roof; rooflights in side and rear roof slopes; external alterations (Demolition of attached garage and single storey rear extension)
